page.title: 02LANGHOLM'S COMMON RIDING
page.content: THE{COMMON RIDING }IS THE MOST IMPORTANT PIECE OF LOCAL HISTORY.IT BEGAN IN{1759}AFTER A COURT CASE CONCERNING THE LAND WHICH BELONGS TO THE TOWN.IT WAS DECIDED THAT ONCE A YEAR THE BOUNDARIES OF THIS LAND HAD TO BE CHECKED AND ANY BOUNDARY MARKERS REPAIRED.BEACONS AND CAIRNS WERE BUILT AND PITS WERE DUG TO MARK THE BOUNDAIRES{.BAULDY BEATTIE}WAS THE FIRST MAN TO DO THIS ON FOOT.IN{1816} THE RIDING OF THE COMMON BEGAN.SEVERAL MEN WENT ROUND THE BOUNDARIES ON HORSEBACK. IN{1817}THE SELECTION OF A CORNET FIRST TOOK PLACE.SINCE{1890}THE CORNET HAS BEEN CHOSEN BY BALLOT.IN {1919}IT WAS DECIDED THAT THE COMMON RIDING BE ALWAYS HELD ON THE LAST FRIDAY IN JULY.ON COMMON RIDING DAY 4 EMBLEMS ARE CARRIED IN THE PARADE.THEY ARE THE{BARLEY BANNOCK,SPADE,SCOTCH {THISTLE}AND{CROWN.}
